1.name: Inception
1.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

2.name: How to Train Your Dragon
2.description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

3.name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
3.description: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.

4.name: The Fighter
4.description: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

5.name: Shutter Island
5.description: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer, who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

6.name: Tangled
6.description: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

7.name: Easy A
7.description: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

8.name: Black Swan
8.description: A committed dancer wins the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake" only to find herself struggling to maintain her sanity.

9.name: The Social Network
9.description: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

10.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
10.description: As Harry, Ron and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

11.name: Toy Story 3
11.description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

12.name: The Last Airbender
12.description: Follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

13.name: Kick-Ass
13.description: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

14.name: Tron
14.description: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

15.name: Clash of the Titans
15.description: Perseus demigod, son of Zeus, battles the minions of the underworld to stop them from conquering heaven and earth.

16.name: Iron Man 2
16.description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

17.name: True Grit
17.description: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

18.name: Blue Valentine
18.description: The relationship of a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.

19.name: Srpski film
19.description: An aging porn star agrees to participate in an "art film" in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a pedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.

20.name: All Good Things
20.description: Mr. David Marks was suspected but never tried for killing his wife Katie who disappeared in 1982, but the truth is eventually revealed.

21.name: The A-Team
21.description: A group of Iraq War veterans look to clear their name with the U.S. Military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

22.name: The Town
22.description: As he plans his next job, a longtime thief tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to one of his earlier heists, as well as the F.B.I. Agent looking to bring him and his crew down.

23.name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
23.description: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

24.name: The Losers
24.description: A CIA special forces team are betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.

25.name: The King's Speech
25.description: The story of King George VI, his impromptu ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

26.name: The Other Guys
26.description: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

27.name: Robin Hood
27.description: In 12th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

28.name: Skyline
28.description: Strange lights descend on the city of Los Angeles, drawing people outside like moths to a flame where an extraterrestrial force threatens to swallow the entire human population off the face of the Earth.

29.name: Womb
29.description: A woman's consuming love forces her to bear the clone of her dead beloved. From his infancy to manhood, she faces the unavoidable complexities of her controversial decision.

30.name: The Expendables
30.description: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

31.name: The Book of Eli
31.description: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

32.name: Burlesque
32.description: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

33.name: Secretariat
33.description: Penny Chenery Tweedy and colleagues guide her long-shot but precocious stallion to set, in 1973, the unbeaten record for winning the Triple Crown.

34.name: Grown Ups
34.description: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

35.name: Valentine's Day
35.description: Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.

36.name: Piranha 3D
36.description: After a sudden underwater tremor sets free scores of the prehistoric man-eating fish, an unlikely group of strangers must band together to stop themselves from becoming fish food for the area's new razor-toothed residents.

37.name: Sex and the City 2
37.description: While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.

38.name: Love & Other Drugs
38.description: A young woman suffering from Parkinson's befriends a drug rep working for Pfizer in 1990s Pittsburgh.

39.name: She's Out of My League
39.description: An average Joe meets the perfect woman, but his lack of confidence and the influence of his friends and family begin to pick away at the relationship.

40.name: Alice in Wonderland
40.description: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

41.name: Incendies
41.description: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

42.name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
42.description: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.

43.name: Winter's Bone
43.description: An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.

44.name: Resident Evil: Afterlife
44.description: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.

45.name: Eat Pray Love
45.description: A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".

46.name: Never Let Me Go
46.description: The lives of three friends, from their early school days into young adulthood, when the reality of the world they live in comes knocking.

47.name: RED
47.description: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.

48.name: Insidious
48.description: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

49.name: I Spit on Your Grave
49.description: A writer who is brutalized during her cabin retreat seeks revenge on her attackers, who left her for dead.

50.name: Killers
50.description: A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple..
